The Contingencies Show

  • Erie Looking Productions
  • RSS
The Contingencies Show is a way to see some of our past in the visual medium. With an inauspicious schedule for the coming television broadcast season, a look at the past may be a useful relief. It can't always be garbage on the "idiot's lantern".

Cosmos: War of the Planets

Aug 25, 2021

A “Spaghetti Space Opera”. Don’t get drunk…

Warning From Space

Aug 24, 2021

An unriffed monster movie from Japan.

Space Internet Governance Webinar

Aug 22, 2021

The Internet Society hosted a panel on “Space Internet” and this is the recording.

NASA Administrator Discusses Collaboration with US Space Force

Aug 22, 2021

From the NASA Image Library: “The Mitchell Institute hosted the Space Power Forum with NASA Administrator Jim Bridenstine and Chief of Space Operations General Jay Raymond on Tuesday, September 22. The space domain is as vitally important to U.S. defense as it is to its scientific and commercial interests, and the establishment of the U.S. Space Force (USSF) raises big questions with implications for all. This conversation with the leaders of NASA and the USSF explored how they intend to collaboratively tackle shared challenges in space, their respective mission requirements, and opportunities to leverage commercial capabilities and innovation.”

Service and Citizenship

Aug 20, 2021

Coronet Films, the folks that made educational films frequently lampooned by Rifftrax, made this offering. This is the second round for Friday. Do you want to be a warmonger today?

Are You A Good Citizen?

Aug 20, 2021

Coronet Films, the folks that made educational films frequently lampooned by Rifftrax, made this offering. This is the first round for Friday.

How To Use The Dial Phone

Aug 19, 2021

Do we feel like we are in the future yet? This is almost one hundred years old and is an instructional piece on how to use a rotary dial telephone.

A Hal Walker film! The description on the Internet Archive claims it is fun and that it has Jerry Lewis in it.
